title: Crashes / Tab Issues When Idling and Resized
author: jcefoli
body_snippet: I am not sure how to completely reproduce this, but have experienced a crash when I use regular RDP to an instance (ie - juimp server) and run mRemoteNG in that RDP session. When the RDP resizes or if I disconnect, I notice that in some special instances mRemoteNG tabs will become messed up and disassociate with the RDP session. They cannot be closed or removed unless you exit the app. I don't know how toi reproduce this 100%, but noted that it happens when mRemoteNG remains connected in an RDP ...

comments.snippet:
Interesting Bug. Would you mind telling us what Version of mRemoteNG you are using on both systems? 
Is that the latest build 1.77.2-nb (20220107) or is it the latest stable release 1.76.20? You can find that information in the Help>About window.
